welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nidderau, Germany! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Nidderau has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer and smaller terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
